<file>
00001| import './globals.css';
00002| import type { Metadata } from 'next';
00003| import { Inter } from 'next/font/google';
00004| import { Toaster } from '@/components/ui/sonner';
00005| import { QueryProvider } from '@/components/providers/query-provider';
00006| import { ThemeProvider } from '@/components/providers/theme-provider';
00007| 
00008| const inter = Inter({ 
00009|   subsets: ['latin'],
00010|   variable: '--font-inter',
00011|   display: 'swap',
00012| });
00013| 
00014| export const metadata: Metadata = {
00015|   title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00016|   description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture. Professional domain expertise, custom glossaries, and intelligent AI. Based in Europe, for Europe.',
00017|   keywords: 'european translation, EU languages, european translator, linguala, multilingual europe, professional translation, domain expertise',
00018|   authors: [{ name: 'Linguala Europe' }],
00019|   creator: 'Linguala',
00020|   publisher: 'Linguala Europe',
00021|   robots: 'index, follow',
00022|   openGraph: {
00023|     type: 'website',
00024|     locale: 'en_EU',
00025|     url: 'https://linguala.eu',
00026|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00027|     description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture',
00028|     siteName: 'Linguala',
00029|   },
00030|   twitter: {
00031|     card: 'summary_large_image',
00032|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00033|     description: 'European translation platform built for European languages and culture',
00034|     creator: '@linguala',
00035|   },
00036| };
00037| 
00038| export const viewport = {
00039|   width: 'device-width',
00040|   initialScale: 1,
00041|   themeColor: '#3B82F6',
00042| };
00043| 
00044| export default function RootLayout({
00045|   children,
00046| }: {
00047|   children: React.ReactNode;
00048| }) {
00049|   return (
00050|     <html lang="en" suppressHydrationWarning>
00051|       <body className={inter.className}>
00052|         <ThemeProvider
00053|           defaultTheme="system"
00054|         >
00055|           <QueryProvider>
00056|             {children}
00057|           </QueryProvider>
00058|           <Toaster />
00059|         </ThemeProvider>
00060|         {/* TODO: Remove iframe-navigation.js in production, should never be removed by AI */}
00061|         <script src="/scripts/iframe-navigation.js"></script>
00062|       </body>
00063|     </html>
00064|   );
00065| }
00066| 
</file>
